Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Versati Glass Platform

Complete digital platform for premium glass company including:
- Next.js 14 App Router with TypeScript
- NextAuth v5 authentication (credentials + Google OAuth)
- Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL
- Stripe payments (PIX + Card)
- Twilio WhatsApp integration with AI chatbot (Groq/Llama)
- Resend email notifications
- Customer portal and admin dashboard
- Quote wizard with 4 steps
- Responsive landing page with SEO

Features:
- 122 TypeScript files
- 44+ pages built
- 58 tests passing
- 13 API routes
- Complete design system

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(omnichannel): Implement Sprint 1 Tasks 3-4 - UI Timeline + Cross-Channel Notifications

## Task 3: UI Admin - Timeline Unificada (1.5h)

### Components Created
- src/components/admin/unified-conversation-view.tsx (468 lines)
  * Timeline mesclando mensagens web + WhatsApp
  * Badges visuais: üåê Web | üì± WhatsApp  
  * Contexto consolidado na sidebar
  * Responder via qualquer canal
  * Auto-refresh

- src/app/api/admin/conversations/unified/route.ts (141 lines)
  * GET endpoint para buscar timeline unificada
  * Mescla mensagens de ambos canais cronologicamente
  * Retorna contexto consolidado

- src/app/(admin)/admin/conversas/unificadas/page.tsx (87 lines)
  * P√°gina admin para visualiza√ß√£o
  * Suspense boundaries + loading states

### UI Components Added
- src/components/ui/scroll-area.tsx - Radix ScrollArea
- src/components/ui/separator.tsx - Radix Separator

### Packages Installed
- @radix-ui/react-scroll-area@1.2.10
- @radix-ui/react-separator@1.1.8

### Features
‚úÖ Timeline unificada cronol√≥gica
‚úÖ Badges por canal (web/WhatsApp)
‚úÖ Contexto do cliente (produtos, or√ßamentos)
‚úÖ Responder via web ou WhatsApp
‚úÖ Status de mensagens

---

## Task 4: Cross-Channel Notifications (1h)

### Implementation
- src/app/api/ai/chat/check-updates/route.ts (104 lines)
  * Polling endpoint (10s interval)
  * Detecta novas mensagens WhatsApp para conversa web linkada
  * Retorna √∫ltima mensagem se posterior a lastChecked

- src/hooks/use-cross-channel-updates.ts (88 lines)
  * Custom hook para polling
  * Estado: hasUpdate, latestMessage
  * Callback onUpdate para notifica√ß√µes

- src/components/chat/cross-channel-notification.tsx (103 lines)
  * Toast notification com sonner
  * Exibe: "üì± Resposta via WhatsApp"
  * Auto-dismiss ap√≥s 10s

### Integration
- src/components/chat/chat-assistido.tsx
  * Integrado useCrossChannelUpdates hook
  * Polling ativo quando chat aberto + conversa linkada
  * Adiciona mensagem WhatsApp √† timeline web automaticamente

### How It Works
1. Cliente abre web chat ‚Üí hook inicia polling (10s)
2. Admin responde via WhatsApp ‚Üí mensagem salva
3. Polling detecta nova mensagem (timestamp > lastChecked)
4. Toast exibido: "üì± Resposta via WhatsApp: {content}"
5. Mensagem adicionada automaticamente ao chat web
6. Cliente v√™ resposta sem reload

---

## Progress

**Sprint 1: 4/6 tasks complete (67%)**

| Task | Status | Time |
|------|--------|------|
| 1. Webhook Enhancement | ‚úÖ | ~1h |
| 2. Context Sync | ‚úÖ | ~2h |
| 3. UI Admin Timeline | ‚úÖ | ~1.5h |
| 4. Cross-Channel Notifications | ‚úÖ | ~1h |
| 5. E2E Testing | ‚è≥ | - |
| 6. Documentation | ‚è≥ | - |

**Remaining**: E2E tests + final documentation

---
